## EthersLiquity.getLqtyLpTokenAllowance() method

Get the liquidity mining contract's allowance of a holder's Uniswap FTM/LUSD LP tokens.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLqtyLpTokenAllowance(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address holding the Uniswap FTM/LUSD LP tokens. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
